verbose_text: The compound works as a kinase inhibitor and was demonstrated to mainly affect the activity of CDC like kinase enzymes (CLKs) [XREF_BIBR], in particular CLK2, in nanomolar concentrations, and dual-specificity tyrosine phosphorylation regulated kinase enzymes (DYRK) [XREF_BIBR], in particular DYRK1A, again in nanomolar concentrations.
evidence: CLKs) [ XREF_BIBR ], in particular CLK2, in nanomolar concentrations, and dual-specificity tyrosine phosphorylation
